content:encoded:
The Ted Ebberly Murder Case from Broadway Is My Beat is our first story on Case Closed this week. That one aired December 29, 1951.

(24:04) Richard Diamond, Private Detective brings our final story with The William Holland Murder Case, his episode from May 31, 1953.

Download CaseClosed697
